generate_config::ConfigManager

generate_config::ConfigManager Class Reference

General config manager which can ask user about config settings, check results and write config file. More...

Detailed Description

General config manager which can ask user about config settings, check results and write config file.

Member Function Documentation

def generate_config::ConfigManager::__init__ (   self,
  settings = [],
  session = None 
)

Constructor.

Parameters:
settings List of tuples defining parameters to ask user for : {'name','question','check_regex',['proposed_val1','proposed_val2']} check_regex can be None Proposed value list can be None. If it isn't, the first value is taken as default choice
